definition: a light, self-propelled movement upwards or forwards, pass abruptly from one state or topic to another
details:
noun
- a light, self-propelled movement upwards or forwards
= synonyms: saltation
- the distance leaped (or to be leaped)
= example: the distance leaped (or to be leaped)
- an abrupt transition
= example: an abrupt transition
= synonyms: saltation
- a sudden and decisive increase
= synonyms: jump
verb
- pass abruptly from one state or topic to another
= example: pass abruptly from one state or topic to another
= synonyms: jump
- move forward by leaps and bounds
= synonyms: spring
- cause to jump or leap
= synonyms: jump
- jump down from an elevated point
= synonyms: jump
